SEARCH:
程序包 Entity

类 HistoryTransactionList

java.lang.Object
Entity.HistoryTransactionList
public class HistoryTransactionList extends Object
The HistoryTransactionList class manages a list of HistoryTransaction objects, providing methods to add transactions, retrieve transactions, and calculate financial summaries such as total income, expenses, and balance.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    HistoryTransactionList()
    Constructs a HistoryTransactionList with an empty list of transactions.
